reviewText: I have been watching this series on Netflix, but they did not have this episode. So I ordered it and it arrived in great shape. I donated it to my local library after watching it.
Adaptation of one of the George stories that I like the best. The characters and the description of the society around them are admirable.

I stumbled upon this series at the local library and became so involved with the charecters that I wanted more. This is a wonderful series and I recommend it to anyone who enjoys mysteries of the British stripe. The contrast between Havers (sharon small) and Lynley (Nathanial Parker) is electric! They play off on another very effectively and the series is entertaining. Stop reading and start viewing!
I was thrilled to get all of these series 1 to 5!! even have series 6 on pre-order only series 1 available here so \i am well ahead of the posse!!
